fields.title: TOP SECRET SQUARE ENIX GAME - english dub
fields.description: We are seeking a talented voice actor to bring to life a central character in our upcoming action-adventure video game. The character is a mysterious, battle-hardened warrior with a complex personality and a dark past.
fields.location: Preferably LA, California, but remote from an at-home studio would be considered

fields.title: UNDISCLOSED DISNEY PROJECT
fields.description: Disney is searching for a talented voice actor to join a top-secret animated feature. The character is a whimsical and adventurous protagonist, full of charm and youthful energy. This project is expected to be a major release, and the chosen voice will play a pivotal role in bringing the story to life.
